username_size: Username field must have a minimum 4 and a maximum of 32 characters
password_size: Password must have at least 6 characters
password_pattern: Password must have at least one uppercase, one lowercase letter and one number
account_activation_failure: This account is either active or the token is invalid
unauthorized_user_update: You are not authorized to update the user
unauthorized_user_logout: Invalid token or missing token to log out
unauthorized_user_delete: You are not authorized to delete the user
password_reset_success: An email to reset password has been sent to your email account
unauthorized_password_reset: You are not authorized to reset password
